/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with life, lined with a variety of shops and buildings that add to the urban charm of the scene. Cars and motorcycles are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the busy nature of the area. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their daily routines. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
